name: df-trnN
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ctrnN, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), crab(s2, cfv(cfv(cdilN, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s3, cfv(cfv(cwpointsN, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s4, cfv(cfv(cwpointsN, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(co(cv(s3), cfv(cpadd, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3))), cfv(cfv(cpolN, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s1)))), cin(co(cv(s4), cfv(cpadd, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))), cfv(cfv(cpolN, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s1)))))))))))
comment: Define set of all translations. Definition of translation in [Crawley] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2012.)
